short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Verses From The Holy Bible

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bible Verse of the day is a browser extension where you new tab is replaced by an encouraging verse from the Holy Bible everyday so that you stay connected with the word of God as you go online each day. A search box enables you to browse the internet right from the extension page.

How to get started:
Bible Verse of the day is a browser extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access to a Bible verse each day along with a search bar for your convenience. The toolbar extension is easy to use and user-friendly.
It does not store or share any personal information, financial details or authentication permissions.

Features:
A Bible Verse of the day on your New Tab
Ease of navigation
Clean & seamless user interface 
Completely free to use

Permissions:
It  needs permission to allow new tabs to display the Bible Verse of the day extension with the features including the access to customised search. This extension does NOT ask for your login or password.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "Bible Verse of the day" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "Bible Verse of the day", click on Remove and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove Bible Verse of the day?", click the Remove button.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://semp.com/privacy-policy) and Terms of Use (https://semp.com/terms/) or contact us at contact@semp.com for any queries.

Disclaimer: Bible Verse of the day is an independent project and functions only as a toolbar extension that has been created to ensure that verses from the Holy Bible can be viewed daily at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data.
